column3: Recall and make sure BOTH N2O Bottles & He Bottle 2 are still closed! Else continue with Abort Procedure
Inform OPS of Passivation out of sequence
Confirm all valve switches are in OFF position (Except OxDV & HPDV)
Confirm all valve switches are in OFF position (Except RMOxSV)
Open & Close OxDV STEPWISE until OxOutPT 0 Bar
Check RHPPT & ROxTPT 1 Bar (If more: continue with Passivation of Rocket, else continue at Finish Passivation)
Open & Close stepwise RDV until RHPPT & ROxTPT 1 Bar
Open RMDV & Step Back, Wait until NCE-Tank is pressureless
Write down remaining Pressure of He Bottle 1
Check and compare pressure HPPT1 with HPPG1
Confirm to OPS that Safety is ensured
